attributes.action: Justice for Lee, get the Hacienda Del Sol, Playa De Las Americas closed down!!!
attributes.additional_details: Everybody needs to sign this petition for it to go to Government and raise awareness of the disgusting way Lee was treated. We want the Hacienda Del Sol in Las Americas, Tenerife shutting down!! It's a hell hole in which members of staff abuse and rob its guests and this is all blatantly ignored by the Spanish Police!! Pass this round as many people as possible as we need 100,000 signatures for it to be looked at!! Thank you.
